#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ull unsigned long long

vector < pair <ull, ull> > rank_list;

bool compare(pair <ull, ull> p1, pair <ull, ull> p2)
{
 if(p1.first < p2.first)
    return 0;
 if(p1.first == p2.first && p1.second > p2.second)
    return 0;
 return 1;
}

int main()
{
 ull n, s, m, q, k, i, ns, tn, r;
 scanf("%lld", &n);
 for(i = 0; i < n; i ++)
 {
  scanf("%lld %lld", &s, &m);
  ns = s * m;
  tn = i + 1;
  rank_list.push_back(make_pair(ns, tn));
 }
 sort(rank_list.begin(), rank_list.end(), compare);
 scanf("%lld", &q);
 while(q --)
 {
  scanf("%lld", &k);
  r = rank_list[k - 1].second;
  printf("%lld \n", r);
 }
 return 0;
}
